title: Pediatric asthma and air pollution
abstract: This study explores the impact of urban air pollution on asthma severity in children. Data from 12 cities were analyzed.

title: Genetic markers in breast cancer
abstract: We identified novel genetic mutations associated with breast cancer progression using whole-genome sequencing.

title: Stroke recovery and neuroplasticity
abstract: A longitudinal study on stroke patients reveals how neuroplasticity supports motor function recovery.

title: Thyroid dysfunction in pregnancy
abstract: This paper reviews the effects of hypothyroidism and hyperthyroidism on maternal and fetal outcomes.

title: COVID-19 vaccine response in elderly
abstract: Immune response to mRNA vaccines was assessed in individuals over 70, showing reduced antibody titers.
